item.title: Indergiri Finance Q3 FY26: Mounting Losses Deepen as NBFC Struggles for Survival
item.description: Indergiri Finance Ltd., a micro-cap non-banking financial company, reported a marginal improvement in its third quarter FY2026 results, though the company remains deeply entrenched in operational distress. The NBFC posted a net profit of ₹0.10 crores in Q3 FY26, a dramatic turnaround from the ₹1.31 crore loss in Q2 FY26, representing a sequential recovery. However, on a year-on-year basis, the company's net profit declined 23.08% from ₹0.13 crores in Q3 FY25, underscoring persistent structural challenges. Time: Feb 17 2026 09:30 PM IST

item.title: Quarterly Earnings Review: Dec-2025 Results Show Mixed Trends Across Market Caps
item.description: The December 2025 quarter earnings season has unfolded with a nuanced picture across Indian equities, as 4,075 companies reported results reflecting a cautious recovery. While the proportion of companies delivering positive earnings has inched up to 46.0%, this marks only a modest improvement from previous quarters, underscoring ongoing challenges amid a complex macroeconomic backdrop. Time: Feb 17 2026 09:00 PM IST

item.title: Jainco Projects Q3 FY26: Micro-Cap Struggles with Minimal Revenue and Mounting Concerns
item.description: Jainco Projects (India) Ltd., a micro-cap trading and distribution company with a market capitalisation of just ₹5.00 crores, reported minimal financial activity in Q3 FY26 (October-December 2025), with net sales of merely ₹0.11 crores and negligible net profit. The stock, currently trading at ₹5.29, remains in bearish technical territory and has declined 26.22% year-to-date, reflecting deep investor scepticism about the company's operational viability and future prospects. Time: Feb 17 2026 07:21 PM IST

item.title: Are Covance Softsol Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: Covance Softsol Ltd's latest Q3 FY26 results are strong, with a net profit increase of 64.19% and an operating margin of 33.37%. However, challenges in capital efficiency and a decline in promoter holding raise concerns about the sustainability of this growth. Time: Feb 17 2026 07:13 PM IST

item.title: Are Elegant Floriculture & Agrotech (India) Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: Elegant Floriculture & Agrotech (India) Ltd's latest Q3 FY26 results are concerning, showing a 96.55% drop in net sales and a 93.33% decline in net profit compared to the previous quarter, raising questions about the sustainability of its business model despite a slight improvement in profit margin. The company's operational volatility and increasing liabilities indicate significant financial challenges ahead. Time: Feb 17 2026 07:13 PM IST

item.title: Are AVG Logistics Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: AVG Logistics Ltd's latest Q3 FY26 results show a net profit of ₹5.40 crores, up 6.30% sequentially but down 2.00% year-on-year, alongside declining net sales for the third consecutive quarter. While operating margins improved to 19.46% due to cost management, rising interest costs raise concerns about financial flexibility amid ongoing revenue challenges. Time: Feb 17 2026 07:13 PM IST

item.title: Are Orissa Bengal Carrier Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: Orissa Bengal Carrier Ltd's latest results are poor, showing a net loss of ₹2.39 crores in Q3 FY26 compared to a profit last year, with revenues down 16.15% year-on-year and significant declines in operating margins and profitability. The company is facing substantial operational challenges and increasing financial pressures. Time: Feb 17 2026 07:13 PM IST

item.title: Are IFGL Refractories Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: IFGL Refractories Ltd's latest results show strong revenue growth of 23.70% year-on-year, but the company reported a net loss of ₹3.08 crores and declining profitability, indicating significant operational challenges despite increased sales. Time: Feb 17 2026 07:12 PM IST

item.title: Are Sinnar Bidi Udyog Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: Sinnar Bidi Udyog Ltd's latest results are concerning, showing a 47.65% decline in net sales and a net loss of ₹0.07 crores, indicating significant operational challenges and negative margins. Despite being debt-free, the company's financial health and investor interest are under pressure due to declining performance. Time: Feb 17 2026 07:12 PM IST

item.title: Are Magnus Steel & Infra Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: Magnus Steel & Infra Ltd's latest results show a net profit of ₹1.08 crores and a 260.47% year-on-year revenue growth, indicating a positive shift in profitability. However, concerns remain due to a 14.84% sequential revenue decline, reduced operating margins, negative shareholder funds, and a high debt-to-equity ratio, highlighting ongoing structural challenges. Time: Feb 17 2026 07:12 PM IST

item.title: Are Rama Paper Mills Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: Rama Paper Mills Ltd's latest results are concerning, showing a net loss of ₹1.62 crores and a drastic revenue decline of 96.72% quarter-on-quarter, indicating severe operational challenges and financial distress. The company faces significant risks to its viability due to negative shareholder funds and ongoing liquidity issues. Time: Feb 17 2026 07:12 PM IST

item.title: Are Supra Pacific Management Consultancy Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: Supra Pacific Management Consultancy Ltd's latest results show impressive revenue growth of 104.45% year-on-year, with a record quarterly net profit of ₹2.09 crores; however, concerns about low return on equity and high debt levels suggest potential risks for investors. Time: Feb 17 2026 07:12 PM IST

item.title: Are Kay Power & Paper Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: Kay Power & Paper Ltd's latest Q3 FY26 results are concerning, showing a net loss of -₹0.09 crore and a 37.75% decline in revenue to ₹4.75 crores, indicating significant operational challenges and a precarious financial outlook. The company's stock has also dropped 71.25% over the past year, reflecting weakened investor sentiment. Time: Feb 17 2026 07:12 PM IST

item.title: Are Alpine Housing Development Corporation Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: Alpine Housing Development Corporation Ltd's latest Q3 FY26 results show a net profit of ₹2.17 crores, up 26.91% year-on-year, and significant quarter-on-quarter improvements in revenue and margins. However, low return on equity and capital employed, along with a high debt-to-EBITDA ratio, indicate ongoing challenges in capital efficiency. Time: Feb 17 2026 07:12 PM IST

item.title: Are Shraddha Prime Projects Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: Shraddha Prime Projects Ltd's latest results show strong year-on-year profit growth of 50.88% and impressive revenue growth of 194.75%, but declining operating margins and a high debt-to-equity ratio raise concerns about financial stability and sustainability. Overall, the performance is mixed, with significant positives and critical challenges to watch. Time: Feb 17 2026 07:12 PM IST
